edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Manages information for the current running game. Creates a new game, restarts the game, checks guesses for validity (and throws exceptions if they are not valid), and provides requested information on the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(String pool, int length, Random rng)
      Starts a new game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Code getCode()
      Returns the secret Code.
      int getGuessCount()
      Returns the number of guesses made in the game so far.
      List<Code.Guess> getGuesses()
      Returns the current list of guesses.
      int getLength()
      Returns the number of characters in the secret Code.
      String getPool()
      Returns the pool of valid characters available for guesses and the Code.
      Code.Guess guess(String text)
      Prompts the validation and creation of a new Code.Guess based on the text of the user's guess.
      void restart()
      Clears the guess list and restarts the game.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(String pool,
            int length,
            Random rng)
        Starts a new game. Prompts Code to generate a new secret code using the provided pool of legal characters, the desired number of characters in the code, and a source of randomness to generate the code. Creates a new empty list of guesses.
        Parameters:
        pool - The pool of valid characters available for guesses and the Code.
        length - The number of characters in the secret Code.
        rng - The source of randomness.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        public Code getCode()
        Returns the secret Code.

      • getGuesses

        public List<Code.Guess> getGuesses()
        Returns the current list of guesses.

      • getPool

        public String getPool()
        Returns the pool of valid characters available for guesses and the Code.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Returns the number of characters in the secret Code.

      • getGuessCount

        public int getGuessCount()
        Returns the number of guesses made in the game so far.

      • guess

        public Code.Guess guess(String text)
                 throws IllegalGuessCharacterException,
                        IllegalGuessLengthException
        Prompts the validation and creation of a new Code.Guess based on the text of the user's guess. Checks the guess to ensure it will not throw a IllegalGuessCharacterException or IllegalGuessLengthException, then gets the guess from Code.Guess and adds the guess to the guesses list.
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the user's guess.
        Returns:
        The (confirmed valid) guess made by the user.
        Throws:
        IllegalGuessCharacterException - Exception for using illegal characters.
        IllegalGuessLengthException - Exception for having an invalid guess length.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Clears the guess list and restarts the game.
